snippet.title: House Party - Murder Mystery Expansion Pack Doorbell Teaser
snippet.description:
House Party's next guest will shake up the party when she arrives this Summer!

So far, you’ve seen Lety called to Madison’s house for an emergency tutoring session, Doja Cat trying to burst down the back fence, and the Game Grumps falling from the freaking sky into the backyard! So, how will the next guest arrive?

Actually, from the same weird Uber you did. Seems like he works the neighborhood a lot. But, anyway, when you play the House Party - Murder Mystery Expansion Pack, you'll go about whatever your normal party activities are (no judgment)…until Madison's front doorbell rings.

But when it rings, things start to get a little... Well, a little whatever the hell that is in the video above. 

Seriously, who wired the lights? Eh, it was probably some jerry-rigged home-brew wiring job Patrick did, right? Nothing to get worried about.

Anyway, that unexpected new guest outside looks hot as hell! Are you going to let her inside?

Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1524910/House_Party__Murder_Mystery_Expansion_Pack/

Wishlist it on GOG:
https://www.gog.com/game/house_party_murder_mystery_expansion_pack
